roleset.name: strict belief in logically unrelated causes and effects
roleset.note: SUPERSTITION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from superstition.01-n)

example.name: ADJ
example.text: Now , the domestic feudal superstition floods in , some places build temples in the name of tourism , and , to a certain extent , these temples that are built affect people 's ideological choice ; many people begin to have dual beliefs .
